Warranty & Support

Amazon.com Return Policy:You may return any new computer purchased from Amazon.com that is “dead on arrival,” arrives in damaged condition, or is still in unopened boxes, for a full refund within 30 days of purchase. Amazon.com reserves the right to test “dead on arrival” returns and impose a customer fee equal to 15 percent of the product sales price if the customer misrepresents the condition of the product. Any returned computer that is damaged through customer misuse, is missing parts, or is in unsellable condition due to customer tampering will result in the customer being charged a higher restocking fee based on the condition of the product. Amazon.com will not accept returns of any desktop or notebook computer more than 30 days after you receive the shipment. New, used, and refurbished products purchased from Marketplace vendors are subject to the returns policy of the individual vendor.

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $199.00
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:39:51 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Smaller Mini PC!

Why Choose Beelink MiniS Mini PC?

1.Newest Design: Smaller!!! As big as palm-size. Compact in size, you can take it anywhere you go.

2.Professional: MiniS mini computer is designed for the business office. Compatible with professional working software.

3.Cost-effective: Built-in Gen 11th N5095 (4C/4T, 4M Cache, 2.0GHz up to 2.9GHz), Which supports DDR4 single-channel, enjoying the extremely fast speed. Equipped with UHD Graphics, dual HDMI and type-c allow you to connect three monitors and multi-tasking.

Note:

If you received a mini pc with windows 11 system, if you need windows 10 pro system, please send us a message and we will guide you to install windows 10 pro.

Top Choice for the Business Office and Education Industry!

Beelink MiniS Mini PC Basic Specifications

CPU: Intel Jasper Lake(Celeron) Processor N5095(4C/4T, 4M Cache, 2GHz up to 2.9GHz) enables better multi-tasking

GPU : Intel UHD Graphics & Dual HDMI2.0 Ports. Support dual display and 4K ultra high definition streaming capability, giving you a best in class television experience with true to life picture quality.

OS: Windows 11 Pro

Language: Multi-language

RAM: 8GB

Hard Disk: 256GB

Network: WiFi 802.11 b/g/n/ac, 2.4+5.8G WiFi, Ethernet 1000Mbps LAN, Bluetooth 4.0

Adapter: Input: 100-240V AC, 50/60Hz , Output: 12V 3A

Fully capable of browsing the internet, word processing (runs Microsoft Office and LibreOffice smoothly), watching movies and photo processing!

Tips to Better Use Mini Pc

You can add a 2TB removable hard drive via the USB 3.0 port, which will allow the device to store even more and your files as you want

Regularly delete the software distribution folder in windows directory to keep updates size use down. This folder is used for updates for windows

Uninstall any program or app that isn’t needed or used. Once done, there was enough space to update Windows

Beelink MiniS Mini computer Support RTC Wake Settings, Auto Power On, Wake On Lan, PXE Boot etc. You can set it on the BIOS(Press the DEL key immediately after pressing the power button to enter the BOIS page)

Note:

To avoid initial setup issues, the first time you use this mini pc , don’t connect network or wifi until the windows system of your mini pc is running!

Rich Interface and Compact Size

Rich interface allows you th connect your home and office set wirelessly and wirely, like your projector, printer and your home TV. As big as palm size and light in weight, which allows easily carry it with you and also attach to the back of the monitor.

Compatible Stylem

Licensed Windows 11 Pro 64bit pre-installed on mini pcs with no visible bloatware.

You can also install Linux OS!

Package

1* Beelink MINI S Mini PC

2*HDMI 100CM&25CM 1.4

1* Power adapter (12V/3A)

1*Wall-Mounted bracket

1* Manual

Major CPU Running Scores, More Powerful than Others!

Common FAQ:

Q1: What should I do if I find a product with a lower pri~ce within a month?

Please do not re~turn, contact our store staff to re~fund the difference, BeelinkUS let you enjoy the lowest pri~ce.(7-day pri~ce protection & excluding official pro~motion days)

Q2: What should I do if I don’t like the windows 11 pro system?

Please do not return, please contact the service staff of our store to get windows 10 pro system files and tutorials.

Q3: How to enter BIOS?

Press “delete” to enter the BIOS settings; press “F7” to enter the boot options menu (click continuously immediately after booting).

Q4: What should I do if a product defect is found?

Please do not return it, you can contact our staff to solve the problem for you, or make compensation. We offer 1-year factory professional support & 7*24 hours online service.

Operating System
windows 10/windows 11/ubuntu windows 10/windows 11/ubuntu windows 10/windows 11/ubuntu windows 10/ubuntu windows 10/ubuntu

Processor
AMD Ryzen 5 5560U (6C/12T, L2 4MB L3 8MB Cache) Intel Jasper Lake Processor N5105 (4C/4T, 4M Cache) Intel Jasper Lake Processor N5105 (4C/4T, 4M Cache) Intel Gemini Lake Refresh Processor J4105 (4C/4T, 4M Cache) Intel Gemini Lake Refresh Processor J4105 (4C/4T, 4M Cache)

Graphics Coprocessor
AMD Radeon Graphics 6 cores (1600 MHz) Intel UHD Graphics (800MHz) Intel UHD Graphics (800MHz) Intel UHD Graphics 600 (750MHz) Intel UHD Graphics 600 (750MHz)

Base/Burst Frequency
2.3 GHz/4.0 GHz 2.0 GHz/2.9 GHz 2.0 GHz/2.9 GHz 1.5 GHz/2.5 GHz 1.5 GHz/2.5 GHz

Memory (RAM) Size
16GB SO-DIMM DDR4 8GB SO-DIMM DDR4 16GB SO-DIMM DDR4 8GB SO-DIMM DDR4 8GB SO-DIMM DDR4

Hard Disk Size
500GB M.2 SSD NVME 2280 500GB M.2 SATA Revision 3.0 SSD 2280 500GB M.2 SATA Revision 3.0 SSD 2280 128GB M.2 SATA Revision 3.0 SSD 2280 256GB M.2 SATA Revision 3.0 SSD 2280

Ethernet /Wireless Connectivity
1000Mbps LAN, 802.11ax Dual-Band Wi-Fi 6E, BT5.2 Dual 1000Mbps LAN, 802.11ac Dual-Band Wi-Fi, BT4.0 Dual 1000Mbps LAN, 802.11ac Dual-Band Wi-Fi, BT4.0 1000Mbps LAN, 802.11ac Dual-Band Wi-Fi, BT4.0 1000Mbps LAN, 802.11ac Dual-Band Wi-Fi, BT4.0

Video Interface
2 x HDMI (4K@60Hz) 2 x HDMI (4K@60Hz) 2 x HDMI (4K@60Hz) 2 x HDMI (4K@60Hz) 2 x HDMI (4K@60Hz)

Auto Power On

✓

✓

✓

✓

✓

◆Smaller but Equally Powerful – Compared with U59 mini pc, MiniS is more compact, only about 4.5x 4 x1.6 inches. As big as palm-size, easier to carry anywhere you go. Powered by 11th Gen processor N5095 (4C/4T, 4M Cache, up to 2.9GHz), delivers incredible responsiveness and is more smooth than J4125, J3455, J4205, N3450, etc. Easily switch back and forth between more applications with 8 + 256GB memory configuration. Compact size makes the mini computers the top choice for your light OFFICE work.
◆UHD Graphics & Dual HDMI2.0 – Mini desktop computer has equipped with UHD Graphics, supporting 4k video playback and web surfing, or connect to your projector as a home theatre, enjoy a variety of entertainment. Dual HDMI2.0 allows you to connect two monitors at the same time, simplifying and doubling your work efficiency.
◆Wireless Supports – The latest wireless connectivity with 802.11ac Dual Band 2.4 & 5GHz Wi-Fi, offers speeds up to 450Mbps on the 2.4GHz band & 1300Mbps on the 5GHz. In addition, there is a built-in Bluetooth4.0 system. High-speed wireless connection technology, reliable and efficient transmission speed, providing a faster internet experience for browsing, streaming and gaming.
◆Intelligent Design – What makes the small pc stand out from other micro pc is that it has an empty expansion bay to allow adding. Beelink MiniS mini desktop pc has built-in 8GB DDR4 RAM, 256GB M.2 SATA SSD (Support up to 2TB of 2.5in 7mm SATA3 HDD /M.2 SATA3 SSD 2280, not included). Also, the VESA mount can free you from the messy desktop. It is convenient to hide the mini pcs on the back of the monitor or HDTV.
◆Efficient Heat Dissipation & Multi-interfaces – The mini computer built-in fantastic cooling fan, heat sink, and hard drive cooler help cool down the hardware and reduce hardware loss, delivering faster response speed. MINI S desktop pc features a variety of interfaces design (4*USB3.0, 2*HDMI2.0, 1*RJ45 1000M LAN, 1*Audio Jack, 1*DC Jack). It also comes with 1 power adapter, 2*HDMI cables, and 1*VESA mount. Small computers easily meet office business needs, home audio and video needs.

Beelink Mini PC

Small But Powerful

    • Beelink Mini PC is famous for its stylish design, multiple functions and good quality. Widely used in office, home entertainment, gaming, education, industry and so on. You will find the most powerful mini computer within your budget here!!!

    Please contact our store staff firstly and we will provide a satisfied solution for you.

    What should I do if I need to update the mini computer?
